hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
shortVer=`echo $version | sed 's/\.//g'` sugarVer=`echo $version` echo "shortVer is $shortVer 
" lowerFlavor=`echo $flavor | tr '[A-Z]' '[a-z]' ` echo "lowerFlavor is $lowerFlavor 
" echo "deploy timestamp is $deploy_timestamp 
"
if [ "$username" != "" ]; then instanceName=${username}_${shortVer}${lowerFlavor} else instanceName=${lowerFlavor}${shortVer} fi echo "instanceName is $instanceName"
sugarShortVer=`echo $version | cut -c 1,2,3` echo "sugarShortVer is $sugarShortVer" case "$sugarShortVer" in "6.5") sodaBranch="6_5_0-voodoo";; *) sodaBranch=`echo $sugarShortVer | tr '.' '_'`"_0" ;; esac echo "sodaBranch is $sodaBranch" GitSodaIceBox="ruby /srv/ci-tools/git_update.rb -r sugarcrm/SodaIceBox -b ${sodaBranch} -p /srv/SodaIceBox" firstChar=`echo $version | cut -c 1` if [ "$firstChar" = "7" ]; then GitSodaIceBox="pwd" fi echo $GitSodaIceBox ssh root@10.25.10.74 " \ ruby /srv/ci-tools/git_update.rb -r sugarcrm/AutoUtils -b master -p /srv/AutoUtils && \ $GitSodaIceBox && \ cd /srv/AutoUtils/jobs-utils/slave/target && \ ruby deploy.rb --ci --version="${version}" --flavor=${lowerFlavor} --env=stack94 --name="${instanceName}" --sodaicebox=/srv/SodaIceBox --source="http://honey-b/builds/${version}/${build_number}/SugarEnt-${version}.zip" && \ echo "${deploy_timestamp}" > /usr/local/apache2/htdocs/${instanceName}/build_date.log "
